storyInfo: The day before leaving Shu for the capital, Liang Xun finally has a chance at a date with Ning Ciqiu for tea and a play in the mountains. Meanwhile, Du Yaoye, Zuo Le and others are about to set off on their own respective journeys.

attributes.content: Still a little chilly, so early in the morning.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Typical of Shangshu's weather. Cool now, hot and hotter by noon. It's a fickle one.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: There is rule to heat and cold. I presume Shangshu's folk have long since accustomed.
Indeed. But seeing the rain come harder lately, I'm worried the weather's about to turn.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Best it isn't some blistering cold or heat, so the people have a little time to adapt.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: The season is here. Shocking turns come as granted.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Boatman, may you ferry me?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: By all means. Where to?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Across the river.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Fine by me. How should this river of yours be crossed, in your view?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Which route? Are you hurrying or taking your time?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: What difference is there?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: If you're in a rush, and time is short, I'll ferry fast. We'll reach the other shore without much effort.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: So what if I am not?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Then we'll have to fix up some wine and sides before we cross.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: The wine's warmed aboard the boat, and we come from upstream to the crossing, staying to the side as we drift down. You can gaze on the city, and see the fields being planted. Fine scenery.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Not half-bad.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Then so it'll be. I'll warm the wine now.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: You're deft at business.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: So this line of work goes. Always a need to play it by ear.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Few sirs like you would turn down viewing more of old Shangshu City. If it's not for the city, then it's for the people.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Quite.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The people deserve to be viewed. If not, then it's been a wasted journey.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: I imagine Liang Xun has informed you—he is to go with me this evening to return to the capital. The way out of Shangshu will be led by you.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: He did inform me.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Don't blame us. Mr. Liang's leaving in a rush here. Us folk can't help but be worried.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Our Magistrate... As good as a parent to us, we say, but he's still young in the end. Resembles the nephews of our own at times. There's concern to be had.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Liang Xun has the talent, and the resolve. Should he withstand, he will be famed and recognized.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: And what if he doesn't?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: —*sigh* No, never mind, I shouldn't ask. If you want to see Shangshu, just come with me.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Only shame is, young Lee's still searching for someone right now. He'll be hard-pressed to meet Mr. Liang this evening if he wants, I think.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: 'Tis still quite cool. 'Tis lucky we are not cold ourselves, with the tea warm.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Official affairs inundate you, my Lord. What brings you here so early?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I agreed to watch the play with you.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Cloak in some more layers. Mind the chill.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: When did we agree this? All I had said was to come if you were free.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: And I'm free today.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Liar. Your work is surely a mountain of bother, with the Grand Tutor so urgent in handing it over to you... Could it be, my Lord, you did not sleep last night?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: *cough* I did get a little shuteye.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You're also early to rise today, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I guessed the headstrong Liang would come at first light despite all exhortation, and so was awaiting you the whole time.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: That. Hm. I...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Your tea cup is empty. Pass it to me.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: 'Tis but a cup of tea. Need we such formalities between us?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: 'Tis pleasant, to be able to sit here in this mountain, drinking tea, shaking oneself awake.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: The refreshments at this shop are quite fine too... the shaobing, sesame cake, and—
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Sweet fritters.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You've lauded this place before.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Ah, and you remembered?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Mm. Being that you're fond, I take note.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Everything of Shangshu is fine, save the slight strength in flavor. Lucky that the pastries by and large are tender and sweet still. They fit my palate.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: *sigh* Your estate stews were very spicy at first, my Lord. Though, they have been considerably better since.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I could not pick up my chopsticks before needing to seek water. How very sorry for me.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: The estate has spice-remedying decoction available at all times.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Miss Ning, your home...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: The waterways of the south. We are no great spice eaters.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I apologize for the trouble.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: What matter is it? We all must adapt at some point.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: So you say, though it's not so easily done.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: 'Tis not hard, should you intend to.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: We all must adapt at some point.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Verily.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You have mentioned you are native to Shangshu, my Lord?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I left home at an early age, and only returned in recent years. You know as much, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I have heard you make mention.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Is it then that you met your Lungmen friend, in your period away?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I knew nothing back then, left to forge my own way, made no shortage of friends, believed the spirit of youth could conquer everything, accomplish anything...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I did plenty of clownishly ridiculous, foolish things.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: 'Tis no foolish thing to make friends.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: My Lord, the friend you have made is a fine one.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: ...I was simply lucky to.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Were it not for such urgent affairs, 'twould only be right we bid your friend on a true, proper tour of Shangshu, being the hosts that we should.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: 'Twould also be more chance to hear some anecdotes of your past, my Lord. Who knows how different you are these days?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I have never changed.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Maybe I have changed some. But...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: What I set out to do, for these common peoples... has never changed.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: When the Grand Tutor last evening proposed I accompany him to the capital... I didn't want to accept, at first.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You denounce me for accepting in your place?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: No. I hardly could.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I should not have hesitated in the first place. I should be thanking you, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: So long as you do not blame me. I understand you are uneasy for Shangshu, as can others, but the Grand Tutor's word is a different story.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: He keeps no mediocrity for company. What he assigns are but the most rugged, hard-fought opportunities.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I believe, should my perception of you not be faulty, that if you had refused in a moment of hesitation, you would surely regret it in time.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I understand... I apologize for worrying you.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: ...Heheh.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Miss Ning...?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Ah, no, nothing. I just suddenly imagined...
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: If you had then and there earnestly, unreservedly agreed to leave, I fear I would perhaps have been quite angry.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Ahem. You're joking, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I am certainly not joking.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* *cough*.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: In so little time, the sun has come up.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: My Lord, are you enjoying this play?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: It's not bad.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Then shall you be descending the mountain sooner?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I'll watch another while.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Miss Ning, watch another while.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Okay, come on, Dad! Stop looking at it!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Why? What's even the point? It's just a travel itinerary! Me and the guys already hashed it out! We're leaving once everything's packed!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: And I have a whole ROOM of stuff that still needs packing, so!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: What's the rush? Let me look over it again...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You're a group of young people. You rush your decisions. That's a recipe for disaster.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: What's wrong with young people? You were all young once, right? Didn't you go all over when you were young, Dad?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Is that a fair comparison?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Without anyone to accompany you, will you be sure of which ways you can go, and which you can't?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: For this long a journey in this season, do you even know what you should bring, and what you shouldn't?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Dad!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Times have changed! Stop lecturing me about your old days!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Yaoye! Listen, there's not much your dad can tell you, so...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: If you're sure you're going to Yumen, then go. I couldn't stop you all anyway. Avoiding the path we laid out for you might just be for the better...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Dad, suppose, um, and I'm just picturing...
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Suppose we don't run our inn here, you've still got a couple cousins. Have you considered going with us to Yumen?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Yaoye, ah...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Ugh, dad, I'm just wondering out loud, I know it's not gonna happen! You can just listen or something...
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Yaoye.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: ...*sigh*.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: This inn was meant to be left to you. If you're not taking it, we may as well close up shop sooner rather than later.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: If you want to set up your own business, I won't stop you. I trust you to have thought it through. But I still need to tell you a thing or two, and I don't want you to think I'm prattling.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Dad...
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: You're leading all those youths. They trust you, follow you. You say times have changed... You're right, times have changed, but this sort of thing doesn't change no matter what the times are.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You step forward, and they're there all at once, so no matter how difficult it gets in future, you can't back down. No matter how tough, how exhausting, you have to bear it. Do you hear me?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I... I know, Dad.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: ...*sigh*. Alright, take the itinerary. I've kept you off of some of the tougher roads. If you can stick to the highways, do so. Never revisit those same muddy paths we waded through.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: No need to worry.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: It's hard, not worrying.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I have a worry, right this moment.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Go on.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Yaoye, you're not young anymore. When you go to Yumen, can you possibly try and bring back a decent young man...?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Stop, stop!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Dad! That is SO stupid to worry about!!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: How is it stupid?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: It just is!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Ugh, jeez, I'm not talking to you anymore. I need to go to Mr. Liang's place anyway.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: What do you want Mr. Liang for?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I'm not the one looking for him, it's that stupid Lee guy!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: If Lee can't find him, Mr. Liang's not likely to be at the estate. What use would you have for going?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: That makes sense. Yeah, okay! He's just using the same trick again to dupe me! I'm gonna go find him and GET MINE!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You proud little girl. When will you finally settle down...?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Do not pry into others' domestics.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: Your concern is unnecessary.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Lin Qingyan, what do you mean by this?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Eat your food.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: You know I'm not referring to that.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You were waiting here from sun-up, so you could hold me from visiting those three. You have to have some reason for me.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I told you, I'll go with you.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: Lin Qingyan!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You're making a scene. Look at yourself.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: I did not make this trip in my capacity with the Central Judicial Office. Disregarding our positions, what should you be calling me?
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: Are you forgetting the rule?
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: ...Auntie.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: Why do you always bring this out to stifle me? It's not as if you're an honest relative. You're just relying on the friendship between the Lins and my dad, and being a generation older.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Just why did the Tianshi Bureaus have you make this trip?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: For the common people, naturally.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: How nice for the common people.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: If that's the case, will you really just ignore... will you really just carry on like this?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The Grand Tutor has made his judgment. I may simply await orders.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: But you, Zuo Le.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: Within the Sui Regulator, you're still green. What is concealed behind this trip to Shangshu is not simple, and as it seems now, you have no awareness of the inside details.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: Dispatched yet barely cognizant. Ridiculous! Who called you here?
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: No one sent me. I volunteered myself.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: What? Don't you believe me?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I do.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: I believe you volunteered yourself, but I also believe there are strange actors behind this.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: This is my first time hearing that the impartial, incorruptible, honest, forthright Lin Qingyan of the Central Judicial Office has learned to speculate on the bureaucracy's murky secrets.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Don't rumors say you're sick of giving those sorts of shameless busybodies the time of day? That if anyone tries to wag on at you, you shock their brain numb?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: This, right now, is far from your style.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You have no need to point fingers at my style of affairs.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: I'm entrusted with your care. When things concern you, it's only natural I exercise some caution.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: ...Tch.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Did you click your tongue at me?
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: I did not. You misheard, Auntie.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Once this matter is through, you should return with me to the capital as well.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: General Zuo desires it.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: Understood. I will accompany you back.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Assistant Minister of Rites... 'tis not a post that participates too much in government affairs.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Did you ever hear, my Lord, how this position of mine came to be?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I'd like to.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You rose upon your own excellence; this I cannot compare to.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: The Ning family... 'tis major in a sense. Sordid that its ancestors were, its descendants did progress. Generations accumulated propriety, connections and assets, and so things passed down.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: My father's father was an official, first rank, assiduous for quite some decades. You should know him even if I did not tell you his name.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I would only be ready to say so to you, my Lord, lest it seem I was flaunting.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Hardly.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Miss Ning... you are a fine one.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I knew you would not think so.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I have told you, too, that I rank seventh within my own generation.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: My father's generation sought otherwise, as did the one below. My oldest cousin is on my father's side, ten or so years my senior, and has long settled himself down.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: As my grandfather prepared to retire from officialdom, so I was at junior vigor's peak, and became drawn into a smuggling and embezzlement case. By a fluke I caught a string of thieves, and the documents landed on my grandfather's desk the following day.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Your ability excels, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Pleasantry.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I would never. It is my honesty.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Then I will believe you.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: My grandfather called me to his study alone; we conversed of little in particular, before he asked me this one question.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: He asked: 'Ciqiu, would you be willing to give your ability and learning for the country, the people, and for the realm?'
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: And I replied...
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: ...You would offer your life.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Without hesitance.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Your spirit is bold, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Enough, now. The story ends here.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: My Lord, your tea is cold.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: It's still somewhat warm.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: But I notice your hands are cold now, my Lord. If you would be willing to have half this cloak back from me, 'tis not out of the question we could steep a freshly brewed pot.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Health is crucial. Wear it well. Don't take it off.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I am fine. If you do not believe, shall we test... if I am warmer than you?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: My hands are cold. Don't be chilled, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Aiya!
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: After today, I don't know when we'll find the chance to meet again.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Take more care of your health, Miss Ning. Don't let the cold tempt you.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Should...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Should you ever wish to view the flowers in future, and don't deem it too far-flung, then you needn't take it upon yourself. Have someone take a letter, and send them to me to plant.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Miss Ning?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Right, ah, um...
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Well... Given you speak so, I will be straightforward too.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: My Lord, how much longer are you going to keep that ribboned jewelry case in your pocket?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: ...Ahem. This is...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: What, my Lord? Could you have possibly intended to give that to another?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Ugh, can't stand it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We shouldn't have taken you to him.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Shouldn't have.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Won't you show yourself?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Wouldn't work, showing myself now.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Their whole back-and-forth's more of a work of art than any stage play.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Who knew old Liang would... *sigh* Never we mind.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: No... That won't do. I do mind!
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Who knew after a decade and change apart, Liang would turn out like this!
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: A decade and change apart. It's not uncommon.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: It gets to me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: At least there's still tea to drink, and a play to watch.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Well, Liang Xun, you owe me another now.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: One last cup of wine with an old friend really is difficult to swing.
attributes.name: Lee
